lines.text:
[Indicating the suit she's wearing]
Very Lil altemus, don't you think?
Very. If that's what you want.
I don't know how my dear brother will take this announcement.
Well, he'll just have to keep a stiff upper lip. that shouldn't be difficult for Uncle Lawrence, should it?
Well, I like Mike, but I'll have to reserve my opinion until after I've eaten the food, because it's not exactly what I'm used to.
I guess Clarence's is more your style. You know, I ate there once, hated it.
Was it the people or the place you didn't like?
Well, that makes sense. No one goes there to eat anyway. They all go to be seen and to look at each other.
